sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Microsoft ( MSFT ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Microsoft has lost about 3.0% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Wal-Mart Stores ( WMT ), trading down 1.2%.
Wal-Mart Stores is showing a gain of 2.6% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.1%, and Exxon Mobil Corp. ( XOM ), trading up 1.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
